name: 8tracks Theme - Green Apples and Cherries

additional_info: V.2 See also -> 8tracks Theme - Blue Orchids and Lavender Log: 08.12 - 13:51 pm - Released Features: *Gradient background; *Different colors in the footer and header; *Words, details and icons have transparent background; *Change fonts to: -Avant Garde -Century Gothic -AppleGothic -sans-serif (fallback) Additional Features: *Ads removed.
